intro: Selenodesmium rigidum, commonly known as the rigid selenodesmium, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apiaceae. It is characterized by its slender, upright stems and small, greenish-white flowers arranged in umbels. The plant typically grows in moist, calcareous soils and is often found in wetlands or along stream banks. Its leaves are lance-shaped and have a distinct, aromatic scent. Selenodesmium rigidum is a rare species, with limited distribution across Europe and parts of Asia.
